/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Construction cranes can be seen in the distance, indicating ongoing development and growth. The road itself is busy with cars and trucks, adding to the dynamic atmosphere of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
